history.content:
Will you have less than 130 units (not including AP/IB units) after your 4th semester? If so, you don't need to petition. Though if you get added to the degree list, you will need to remove yourself (students are automatically added to the degree list when they are eligible - 4 semesters for junior transfers, 8 semesters for freshmen admits).

If you will be exceeding 130 units by the end of your 4th semester, you will need to petition for excess units/extra semester, and you can do so by meeting with a L&S advisor (by making an appointment in Cal Central, more about that here.)

How would a LSCS student petition to stay an extra semester to take more classes and finish CS degree requirement? I am supposed to be graduating next spring (I am a transfer), but I would like an extra semester as a Berkeley student (not UC Berkeley Extension) to finish my degree without killing myself with 4 technicals a semester. How would I petition for that? Thank you!
history.subject: Petition to stay an extra semester
